channel.title: [PI] H's Empire - Need professional coders
channel.description:
Hi users of Moparscape,
[b]Information:[/b] [b]I have been working on H's Empire now for already a long time and the result is that it is a fairly good server. BUT I am NOT going to stop there! I have posted this post on this board because we need Coders and WE are going to make this server the best so please help out.[/b]
Server Information: [PI] Base 634 Items 602 NPCS 602 Animations + GFX Perfect pvp/pk system Working leech Nearly all Dupes Fixed New Commands! Donator Store (Making Donating Automatic) Donator point system fully working Voting Points Store Working specials Dungeoneering nearly added Dungeoneering levels added Dungeoneering Floors nearly added Dungeoneering points and shops added And more!
Pictures of server: [IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/10csrow.png[/img] [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/vcthec.png[/img] [IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/27zx6yd.png[/img] [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/5r8eg.png[/img]
Positions left: Programmer (1/3) GFX designer (0/2) Website developer (1/2) Moderator (1/2) Administrator (0/1) Beta testers (0/3)
Layout: [code]Name: Age: Apply Positions: Experience: Previous Work: How Active Will you be: MSN:[/code]
My website is: www.hsempire.netii.net Because this is the Development team page I don't think I needed to get approval of my website. If im not allowed to place my website tell me and I will remove it.

item.title: [PI] H's Empire - Need professional coders
item.dc:creator: @Smallboy Smallboy
item.description:
@Smallboy wrote:

Get a life and stop copying on what i type . Use your brain to type your own words -.-
and your not allowed to put your website without any approval .

My project: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,517703.0.html

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] H's Empire - Need professional coders
item.dc:creator: @hrach123 hrach123
item.description:
@hrach123 wrote:

[quote=“KingKoder, post:2, topic:415952”]Name: Jason Mear
Age: 15
Apply Positions: Coder
Experience: 3 1/2 Java
Previous Work: Project RuneFestScape
How Active Will you be: Close to 24/7
MSN: KingKoder@live.com[/quote]
And AlexG

I’ve added both of you on msn.
And to all those people that think I’ve leached this I haven’t.

Read full topic

Information:
I have been working on H’s Empire now for already a long time and the result is that it is a fairly good server. BUT I am NOT going to stop there!
I have posted this post on this board because we need Coders and WE are going to make this server the best so please help out.
